scripts.dev: concurrently "uvicorn web_app.backend.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --ssl-certfile web_app/cert.pem --ssl-keyfile web_app/key.pem" "cd web_app/frontend && npm start" "sleep 2 && osascript -e 'tell application \"Google Chrome\" to set theUrl to \"https://localhost:3000\" \\nset isOpen to false \\nrepeat with w in windows \\nrepeat with t in tabs of w \\nif (URL of t as string) starts with theUrl then \\nset isOpen to true \\nset index of w to 1 \\nset active tab index of w to (index of t) \\nexit repeat \\nend if \\nend repeat \\nif isOpen then exit repeat \\nend repeat \\nif not isOpen then open location theUrl \\nend if \\nend tell'"
